cab.content: .........:.........Military Secret, HIS a/irvwiHUfctoi-j-v^vt a v/",-i-^-!S ) 'rom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 2nd January 1920. (Received 3rd.) 16. 2nd January. Malleson telegraphs 31st December: " My Agent at Khaf wires 30th December : On 24th December (? ten) Bolsheviksand (? two) of Kasim Beg's Turkish followers arrived Herat with two carts containingaeroplane parts, also cases of petrol and some wireless equipment. On 26th Decemberthey left for Kabul via Kandahar with escort of 14 Afghan cavalry."a
